mapper.select: select t3.structure_id, t3.structure_code, t3.structure_name, t3.pic1, t3.click_num, CONCAT(t1.structure_name,",",t2.structure_name,",",t3.structure_name) as description, t3.status from (select * from tb_structure WHERE structure_id = #{pid}) as t1 left join tb_structure t2 on t1.structure_id = t2.pid left join tb_structure t3 on t2.structure_id = t3.pid where t1.status = ${0} and t2.status = ${0} and t3.status = ${0} order by t3.click_num DESC LIMIT #{num}
mapper.update: update tb_structure set click_num=click_num+1 where structure_id=#{structureId}
